page.title: 17CHURCHES
page.content: NAVE 14th. century.Angel roof 15th. Century(1439-51).The pews have carvings of animals,mainly dogs. SCREEN 15th. century (perpendicular). Shows SS.Withburga, Felix, Mary Magdelene,Peter,Paul,the Virgin and Child,Edmund and Ethelreda. CHANCEL 14th. Century.Priest's door probably Norman. S.AISLE 14th. century (decorated).It is thought that "Our Lady of Woolpit" stood here. PORCH 1451 (perpendicular).Used for the churching of women,the Palm Sunday Procession and the distrbution of legacies from wills. HOLY WELL (south side)Its waters were supposed to cure sore eyes.
